meanings.definition: Highly pleasing or delightful to the taste or smell.
meanings.sent1: The cake was so delectable that everyone wanted seconds.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of freshly baked bread was truly delectable.
meanings.sent3: The delectable scent of cookies lured everyone to the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in delectable hues of orange and pink.
meanings.sent5: The delectable flavors of the ice cream left a lasting impression on my taste buds.

meanings.sent1: The movie was delectable, and we all had a great time watching it.
meanings.sent2: The vacation by the beach was truly delectable and relaxing.
meanings.sent3: The delectable surprise party made her birthday unforgettable.
meanings.sent4: The delectable music filled the room with joy and laughter.
meanings.sent5: The delectable feeling of accomplishment after finishing the project was rewarding.
